Author: Mische#6695
Content:
Use Verus version of Agama -  https://veruscoin.io/wallet.html
Start VRSC Lite mode 
Create new seed which will generate new address which is compatible with KMD and all assetchains.
Keep the seed safely backed up (make a note of that address)

Author: Mische#6695
Content:
The new address can store all Komodo assetchains linked to it, even if the wallet you are using does not display those coins. Make sure to backup the seed / private key.  As long as you have the these safely stored, you can access your funds later.

If you have Agama installed, use that to send funds out. If experiencing SPV connection issues, try an alternative below. 

Use Agama webwallet ONLY to send funds out immediately https://www.atomicexplorer.com/wallet/#/
